Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
lista4.gameLogic.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Singleton class responsible for managing the overall game flow. It maintains the board, current game context, and communicates with the output adapter. Handles starting/stopping the game, player moves, and turn management.

      public void waitGame()
      Pauses the game (wait state) and notifies all players.

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(Move move)
      Attempts to make a move for a player. Updates the board, switches turns, and notifies clients.
      Parameters:
      move - Move object containing coordinates and player color

    • passMove

      public void passMove(PlayerColor playerColor)
      Player passes their turn. Switches to next player and updates game state.
      Parameters:
      playerColor - Player who passes

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame(PlayerColor playerColor)
      Resumes the game for a given player.
      Parameters:
      playerColor - Player resuming the game
